main event: A Navy jet pilot observed a flaming object over Donaldsonville, Louisiana on April 10, 1958, which broke into multiple pieces while emitting bluish-white flames.
interesting points: The object initially appeared light blue and changed to blue-green as flames increased,The object broke into four or five parts shortly after the first observation,It was described as teardrop-shaped and pea-sized with bright silver edges,A civilian UFO investigator also noted similar sightings,Weather reports indicated clear conditions at the time of the sighting.
